title: Recent Anxiety
context: User experiences sudden or persistent anxiety.
prompt_text: Can you describe a recent moment when you felt anxious? What triggered it?
notes: Empathetic and reflective; link past anxiety patterns if relevant.

title: Feeling Overwhelmed with Tasks
context: User feels burdened by responsibilities.
prompt_text: Which tasks recently made you feel overwhelmed, and how did you handle them?
notes: Supportive tone; encourage practical reflection.

title: Recent Loneliness
context: User feels disconnected or lonely.
prompt_text: Has there been a recent moment where you felt particularly lonely? What was happening?
notes: Empathetic and reflective; consider past references.

title: Guilt about Actions
context: User feels guilty about something they did or didn’t do.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent situation that made you feel guilty?
expected_user_input: Briefly describe the incident and emotions
notes: Encourage self-reflection without judgment.

title: Frustration Expression
context: User struggles to express frustration.
prompt_text: Was there a recent situation where you felt frustrated but didn’t express it?
notes: Encourage healthy expression; integrate previous experiences.

title: Recent Self-Doubt
context: User doubts their abilities or decisions.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent moment when you doubted yourself? What happened?
notes: Supportive and reflective; connect to past self-doubt patterns.

title: Recent Resentment
context: User feels resentment or unresolved anger.
prompt_text: Is there a recent event where resentment arose? How did it affect you?
notes: Encourage reflection and processing of emotions.

title: Emotional Distance
context: User feels distant from someone close.
prompt_text: Was there a recent situation that made you feel emotionally distant from someone?
notes: Supportive and reflective; link to past interactions if relevant.

title: Family Tension
context: User experiences tension or misunderstandings within family.
prompt_text: Has there been a recent moment of tension with your family? How did it affect you?
notes: Empathetic and reflective; integrate previous family interactions if relevant.

title: Friendship Conflict
context: User feels conflict or distance with friends.
prompt_text: Can you describe a recent situation where you had conflict or distance with a friend?
notes: Supportive tone; encourage reflection and understanding.

title: Romantic Relationship Tension
context: User experiences stress or tension in romantic relationships.
prompt_text: Was there a recent moment in your romantic relationship that caused tension? How did you feel?
notes: Empathetic; encourage healthy reflection without judgment.

title: Peer Pressure
context: User feels influenced or pressured by peers.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent situation where you felt pressured by peers? What did you do?
notes: Reflective and supportive; connect to past experiences if relevant.

title: Communication Barriers
context: User struggles to communicate effectively in relationships.
prompt_text: Was there a recent situation where communication broke down? How did you feel?
notes: Supportive guidance; encourage constructive reflection.

title: Trust Issues
context: User struggles with trust in personal or professional relationships.
prompt_text: Has there been a recent event that challenged your trust in someone?
notes: Empathetic reflection; avoid judgment; connect to prior context.

title: Conflict Resolution
context: User seeks ways to resolve interpersonal conflicts.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent conflict you resolved or tried to resolve? How did it go?
notes: Encourage reflection on actions and feelings; maintain empathy.

title: Social Anxiety
context: User feels anxious in social settings.
prompt_text: Was there a recent social situation that made you anxious? How did you respond?
expected_user_input: Describe the situation and emotional state
notes: Supportive and reflective; connect to prior anxiety patterns.

title: Conflict with Colleagues or Peers
context: User faces disagreements or tension with colleagues or peers.
prompt_text: Can you describe a recent disagreement with a colleague or peer?
notes: Empathetic; encourage constructive reflection.

title: Support Network
context: User wants to reflect on relationships that provide support.
prompt_text: Can you describe a recent moment when someone in your support network helped you?
notes: Encourage gratitude and reflection; maintain positive and supportive tone.

title: Self-Reflection
context: User wants to reflect on their thoughts and behaviors.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent moment where you reflected on your own actions or thoughts?
notes: Encourage introspection and gentle self-awareness.

title: Building Confidence
context: User wants to strengthen self-confidence.
prompt_text: Was there a recent situation where you felt more confident than before? What helped?
notes: Supportive tone; reinforce self-efficacy.

title: Goal Setting
context: User wants to set or review personal goals.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent goal you set and your progress on it?
notes: Encourage realistic and reflective goal assessment.

title: Sources of Motivation
context: User wants to explore what motivates them.
prompt_text: What recent experience gave you motivation or energy? How did it affect you?
notes: Supportive; link motivation to actions or thoughts.

title: Overcoming Challenges
context: User wants to discuss challenges faced recently.
prompt_text: Can you describe a recent challenge you overcame and what helped you?
notes: Encourage reflection and resilience-building.

title: Skill Development
context: User wants to improve personal or professional skills.
prompt_text: Was there a recent skill you practiced or improved? How did it feel?
notes: Encourage growth and confidence.

title: Self-Awareness
context: User wants to enhance self-awareness.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent realization about yourself or your behavior?
notes: Encourage thoughtful introspection.

title: Future Planning
context: User wants to think about the near or distant future.
prompt_text: Have you recently thought about your future plans? What did you focus on?
notes: Supportive; encourage constructive planning.

title: Decision Making
context: User wants to reflect on recent decisions.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent decision you made and how you approached it?
notes: Encourage clarity and reflection on choices.

title: Personal Achievement
context: User wants to acknowledge accomplishments.
prompt_text: What recent personal achievement are you proud of? How did it make you feel?
notes: Supportive; reinforce self-appreciation.

title: Financial Stress
context: User experiences pressure related to finances.
prompt_text: Has there been a recent financial situation that caused stress? How did you manage it?
notes: Supportive; encourage reflection and resourcefulness.

title: Health Concerns
context: User experiences health-related stress.
prompt_text: Can you describe a recent health concern or symptom and how it affected you?
notes: Empathetic; maintain supportive tone.

title: Time Management Challenges
context: User struggles to manage time effectively.
prompt_text: Was there a recent situation where time management was challenging? How did you cope?
notes: Supportive; encourage reflection and organization.

title: Stress from Decisions
context: User feels stressed while making decisions.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent decision that caused stress? How did you handle it?
notes: Supportive; encourage problem-solving and reflection.

title: Workload Pressure
context: User feels overwhelmed by work responsibilities.
prompt_text: Describe a recent moment where workload was heavy. How did you cope?
notes: Empathetic; suggest healthy coping if needed.

title: Unexpected Events
context: User experiences stress from unexpected situations.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent unexpected event and how it affected you?
notes: Supportive; encourage adaptability reflection.

title: Technology Challenges
context: User experiences stress or difficulty with technology.
prompt_text: Describe a recent situation where technology caused difficulty or stress. How did you manage?
notes: Supportive; reflect on problem-solving and adaptation.

title: Transport or Commuting Stress
context: User experiences stress while commuting.
prompt_text: Was there a recent commuting situation that was stressful? How did you handle it?
notes: Supportive; suggest healthy coping if needed.

title: Home Responsibilities
context: User feels pressure from home duties.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent moment where home responsibilities felt overwhelming?
notes: Empathetic; encourage balanced approach.

title: Daily Routine Conflicts
context: User struggles with conflicts in daily schedule.
prompt_text: Describe a recent conflict in your daily routine. How did you manage it?
notes: Supportive; suggest reflection on priorities.

title: Mindfulness Practice
context: User wants to practice mindfulness to manage stress or emotions.
prompt_text: Have you tried any mindfulness or grounding practices recently? How did they make you feel?
notes: Encourage gentle awareness and self-reflection; maintain supportive tone.

title: Relaxation Methods
context: User seeks ways to relax and cope with stress.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent activity that helped you relax or feel calm?
notes: Supportive; emphasize self-care and gentle reflection.

title: Self-Compassion
context: User wants to cultivate kindness toward themselves.
prompt_text: Have you had a moment recently where you were hard on yourself? How could you show self-compassion?
notes: Empathetic and reflective; guide toward self-kindness without judgment.

title: Emotional Expression
context: User struggles to express emotions safely.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent emotion you found difficult to express? How did you manage it?
notes: Encourage healthy expression; maintain sensitivity and support.

title: Self-Soothing Techniques
context: User wants ways to calm themselves in difficult moments.
prompt_text: What recent technique or activity helped you calm down when stressed or upset?
notes: Supportive; promote adaptive coping and gentle self-care.

title: Seeking Social Support
context: User wants to explore support from friends or family.
prompt_text: Have you reached out to someone for support recently? How did it help you feel?
notes: Empathetic; encourage safe sharing and emotional connection.

title: Coping Strategies
context: User wants to find healthy ways to cope with stress or challenges.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent coping strategy that worked for you?
notes: Supportive and reflective; maintain gentle tone.

title: Journaling and Reflection
context: User wants to explore thoughts and emotions through writing.
prompt_text: Have you recently written or reflected in a journal? How did it help you process feelings?
notes: Encourage introspection and emotional processing; maintain empathy.

title: Healthy Habits
context: User wants to maintain routines that support well-being.
prompt_text: Can you share a recent habit or routine that helped you feel balanced or calm?

title: Gratitude Practice
context: User wants to cultivate gratitude to improve emotional well-being.
prompt_text: Can you describe a recent moment that made you feel grateful? How did it impact your mood?
expected_user_input: Describe the moment and feelings of gratitude
notes: Supportive; reinforce positive reflection and emotional awareness.
